attributes.action: Initiate a public enquiry to investigate and validate the alledged cost savings provided by PPP to Government contracts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We urge the government to review contracts placed under PPP to investigate if best value for money is being obtained.

Big business is now moving away from outsourcing and returning to in-house expertise. 

Many organisations providing PPP services are now appearing to fail to deliver or have spiralling costs which the government seem willing to pay.
We believe only a public enquiry will demonstrate if PPPs are providing the best value for money.
